languages.text: "К нам, к сожалению, не смог присоединиться многоуважаемый Заккари Вайс, хормейстер, глава {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}астропатической{/g} службы. В его ведении — коммуникации с отдаленными звездными системами. Заккари уже некоторое время в трансе, пытается связаться с другими планетами протектората фон Валанциус, передать им весть о кончине Леди Теодоры и предательстве Кунрада Войгтвира. Я доставлю вашему благородию отчет о работе астропата, как только это станет возможно".

traits.locale_text: "К нам, к сожалению, не смог присоединиться многоуважаемый Заккари Вайс, Хор-мастер, глава {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}астропатической{/g} службы. В его ведении — коммуникации с отдаленными звездными системами. Заккари уже некоторое время в трансе, пытается связаться с другими планетами торговой империи фон Валанциус, передать им весть о кончине леди Теодоры и предательстве Кунрада Войгтвира. Я доставлю вашему благородию отчет о работе астропата, как только это станет возможно".

languages.text: "Unfortunately, our Choirmaster, the esteemed Zacchary Weisz, head of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropath{/g} section, is unable to join us. He is in charge of communications with distant star systems. Master Weisz has been in a trance for some time now, attempting to contact other planets in the von Valancius protectorate and inform them of Lady Theodora's passing and Kunrad Voigtvir's treachery. I will deliver a report to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} on the Astropath's progress as soon as it is possible to do so."
languages.original_text: "К нам, к сожалению, не смог присоединиться многоуважаемый Заккари Вайс, хормейстер, глава {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}астропатической{/g} службы. В его ведении — коммуникации с отдаленными звездными системами. Заккари уже некоторое время в трансе, пытается связаться с другими планетами протектората фон Валанциус, передать им весть о кончине Леди Теодоры и предательстве Кунрада Войгтвира. Я доставлю вашему благородию отчет о работе астропата, как только это станет возможно".

traits.locale_text: "Unfortunately, our Choir Master, the esteemed Zacchary Weisz, head of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropath{/g} section, is unable to join us. He is in charge of communications with distant star systems. Master Weisz has been in a trance for some time now, attempting to contact other planets in the von Valancius trade empire and inform them of Lady Theodora's passing and Kunrad Voigtvir's treachery. I will deliver a report to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} on the Astropath's progress as soon as it is possible to do so."

Master Weisz has been in a trance for some time now, attempting to contact other planets in the von Valancius protectorate and inform them of Lady Theodora's passing and Kunrad Voigtvir's treachery. I will deliver a report to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} on the Astropath's progress as soon as it is possible to do so."

languages.text: “遗憾的是，我们的唱诗大师兼{g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}星语者{/g}的负责人，尊敬的扎卡里·威茨无法加入我们。他负责与遥远的星系进行通信。威茨大师已经沉思了好长时间了，他一直试着与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝麾下的其他行星取得联系，告知他们西奥多拉夫人已经去世，昆拉德·维特威尔背叛了我们。等一切处理好之后，我将立刻向您提交一份关于星语者联络进展的相关报告，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, our Choirmaster, the esteemed Zacchary Weisz, head of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropath{/g} section, is unable to join us. He is in charge of communications with distant star systems. Master Weisz has been in a trance for some time now, attempting to contact other planets in the von Valancius protectorate and inform them of Lady Theodora's passing and Kunrad Voigtvir's treachery. I will deliver a report to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} on the Astropath's progress as soon as it is possible to do so."

traits.locale_text: “遗憾的是，我们的唱诗大师兼{g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}星语者{/g}的负责人，尊敬的扎卡里·威茨无法加入我们。他负责与遥远的星系进行通信。威茨大师已经沉思了好长时间了，他一直试着与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝麾下的其他行星取得联系，告知他们西奥多拉夫人已经去世，昆拉德·维特威尔背叛了我们。等一切处理好之后，我将立刻向您提交一份关于星语者联络进展的相关报告，舰长大人。”

languages.text: 「残念ながら、我々の聖歌隊長であり、{g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}感応通信官{/g}部門の責任者である尊敬すべきザッカリー・ワイズは参加できません。彼は遠くの星系との通信を担当しています。マスター・ワイズはここしばらくの間トランス状態にあり、フォン・ヴァランシウス保護国内の他の惑星と連絡を取り、テオドラ様の死とクンラッド・ボイドヴィアの裏切りを知らせようとしています。感応通信官の進捗状況については、可能な限り迅速に報告いたします」
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, our Choirmaster, the esteemed Zacchary Weisz, head of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropath{/g} section, is unable to join us. He is in charge of communications with distant star systems. Master Weisz has been in a trance for some time now, attempting to contact other planets in the von Valancius protectorate and inform them of Lady Theodora's passing and Kunrad Voigtvir's treachery. I will deliver a report to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} on the Astropath's progress as soon as it is possible to do so."

traits.locale_text: 「残念ながら、我々の聖歌隊長であり、{g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}感応通信官{/g}部門の責任者である尊敬すべきザッカリー・ワイズは参加できません。彼は遠くの星系との通信を担当しています。マスター・ワイズはここしばらくの間トランス状態にあり、フォン・ヴァランシウス保護国内の他の惑星と連絡を取り、テオドラ様の死とクンラッド・ボイドヴィアの裏切りを知らせようとしています。感応通信官の進捗状況については、可能な限り迅速に報告いたします」

languages.text: "Leider ist Zacchary Weisz, unser Chormeister und Leiter der {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropathen{/g}-Sektion, derzeit unabkömmlich. Er ist zuständig für die Kommunikation mit entfernten Sternensystemen. Meister Weisz befindet sich schon seit einiger Zeit in Trance und versucht, Kontakt zu anderen Planeten des Protektorats von Valancius aufzunehmen, um sie über Lady Theodoras Dahinscheiden und den Verrat durch Kunrad Voigtvir in Kenntnis zu setzen. Ich werde Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} baldmöglichst einen Bericht über den Fortschritt des Astropathen zukommen lassen."
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, our Choirmaster, the esteemed Zacchary Weisz, head of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropath{/g} section, is unable to join us. He is in charge of communications with distant star systems. Master Weisz has been in a trance for some time now, attempting to contact other planets in the von Valancius protectorate and inform them of Lady Theodora's passing and Kunrad Voigtvir's treachery. I will deliver a report to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} on the Astropath's progress as soon as it is possible to do so."

traits.locale_text: "Leider ist Zacchary Weisz, unser Chormeister und Leiter der {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropathen{/g}-Sektion, derzeit unabkömmlich. Er ist zuständig für die Kommunikation mit entfernten Sternensystemen. Meister Weisz befindet sich schon seit einiger Zeit in Trance und versucht, Kontakt zu anderen Planeten des Protektorats von Valancius aufzunehmen, um sie über Lady Theodoras Dahinscheiden und den Verrat durch Kunrad Voigtvir in Kenntnis zu setzen. Ich werde Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} baldmöglichst einen Bericht über den Fortschritt des Astropathen zukommen lassen."

languages.text: « Notre chef de la section des {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}astropathes{/g}, l'honorable maître de chœur Zacchary Weisz, ne peut malheureusement pas se joindre à nous. Il est chargé des communications avec les systèmes stellaires éloignés. Maître Weisz est en transe depuis un certain temps. Il tente d'entrer en contact avec d'autres planètes du protectorat von Valancius et les informer du décès de dame Théodora et de la trahison de Kunrad Voigtvir. Je remettrai à Votre Seigneurie un rapport sur les résultats de notre astropathe dès que possible. »
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, our Choirmaster, the esteemed Zacchary Weisz, head of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropath{/g} section, is unable to join us. He is in charge of communications with distant star systems. Master Weisz has been in a trance for some time now, attempting to contact other planets in the von Valancius protectorate and inform them of Lady Theodora's passing and Kunrad Voigtvir's treachery. I will deliver a report to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} on the Astropath's progress as soon as it is possible to do so."

traits.locale_text: « Notre chef de la section des {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}astropathes{/g}, l'honorable maître de chœur Zacchary Weisz, ne peut malheureusement pas se joindre à nous. Il est chargé des communications avec les systèmes stellaires éloignés. Maître Weisz est en transe depuis un certain temps. Il tente d'entrer en contact avec d'autres planètes du protectorat von Valancius et les informer du décès de dame Théodora et de la trahison de Kunrad Voigtvir. Je remettrai à Votre Seigneurie un rapport sur les résultats de notre astropathe dès que possible. »

languages.text: «Por desgracia, nuestro maestro del coro, el estimado Zacchary Weisz, líder de la sección de {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}astrópatas{/g}, no puede unirse a nosotros. Está a cargo de las comunicaciones con sistemas estelares lejanos. El maestro Weisz lleva un tiempo en trance, tratando de contactar con otros planetas del protectorado de los von Valancius para informarles del fallecimiento de lady Theodora y la traición de Kunrad Voigtvir. Entregaré un informe a mi{mf|lord|lady} sobre el progreso de los astrópatas en cuanto me sea posible».
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, our Choirmaster, the esteemed Zacchary Weisz, head of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropath{/g} section, is unable to join us. He is in charge of communications with distant star systems. Master Weisz has been in a trance for some time now, attempting to contact other planets in the von Valancius protectorate and inform them of Lady Theodora's passing and Kunrad Voigtvir's treachery. I will deliver a report to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} on the Astropath's progress as soon as it is possible to do so."

traits.locale_text: «Por desgracia, nuestro maestro del coro, el estimado Zacchary Weisz, líder de la sección de {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}astrópatas{/g}, no puede unirse a nosotros. Está a cargo de las comunicaciones con sistemas estelares lejanos. El maestro Weisz lleva un tiempo en trance, tratando de contactar con otros planetas del protectorado de los von Valancius para informarles del fallecimiento de lady Theodora y la traición de Kunrad Voigtvir. Entregaré un informe a mi{mf|lord|lady} sobre el progreso de los astrópatas en cuanto me sea posible».

languages.text: "Ne yazık ki {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropat{/g} bölümünün başı, Koro Üstadı saygıdeğer Zacchary Weisz aramıza katılamadı. Kendisi uzak yıldız sistemleriyle iletişimden sorumludur. Üstat Weisz bir süredir trans hâlinde, von Valancius protektorasındaki diğer gezegenlerle temas kurmaya ve onları Leydi Theodora'nın ölümü ile Kunrad Voigtvir'in ihaneti hakkında bilgilendirmeye çalışıyor. Astropat'tan gelişmeleri öğrenir öğrenmez {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne bir rapor sunacağım."
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, our Choirmaster, the esteemed Zacchary Weisz, head of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astropath}Astropath{/g} section, is unable to join us. He is in charge of communications with distant star systems. Master Weisz has been in a trance for some time now, attempting to contact other planets in the von Valancius protectorate and inform them of Lady Theodora's passing and Kunrad Voigtvir's treachery. I will deliver a report to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} on the Astropath's progress as soon as it is possible to do so."

Üstat Weisz bir süredir trans hâlinde, von Valancius protektorasındaki diğer gezegenlerle temas kurmaya ve onları Leydi Theodora'nın ölümü ile Kunrad Voigtvir'in ihaneti hakkında bilgilendirmeye çalışıyor. Astropat'tan gelişmeleri öğrenir öğrenmez {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne bir rapor sunacağım."
